title: Krunker.io
description: A fast-paced first-person shooter with low-poly graphics and advanced movement mechanics. Choose from multiple classes with unique abilities and weapons, customize your character, and compete in various game modes. Known for its quick matches and skill-based gameplay.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to crouch. Mouse to aim and click to shoot. Advanced players use slide-hopping (jump + crouch while moving) for faster movement. On mobile, use the virtual controls to move and shoot.
